intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the organization of the Repository.

item.title: Show the perspective Talend OpenStudio
item.description: On the Window Menu, click on Perspective and choice Talend OpenStudio.

item.title: Organize the Repository
item.description: The Repository is used to manage all elements of the current project. To access the metadata types, open the node Metadata.

item.title: Create a folder
item.description: For an optimal management, you can organize the 3 subfolders of the “Metadata” by new folders. On each elements of this tree, use the right click -> create folder.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description:
Congratulation, you can now access and organize Repository.
The tree structure of files could be modified thereafter. You will be able to as move the metadatas as you will create to improve this organization later on.
You can create as many folders as you want and when the organization of the tree satisfies you, use "Click to Complete".
